abstract: In November, Google will start penalizing the search rankings of sites that show “please install our app” ads, a move that rivals say has less to do with providing users with a good experience and more to do with protecting Google’s business.

headline.main: Competitors Accuse Google of Using Search to Diminish Apps

snippet: In November, Google will start penalizing the search rankings of sites that show “please install our app” ads, a move that rivals say has less to do with providing users with a good experience and more to do with protecting Google’s business.
